title: How to Make Lavender Shortbread

steps.headline: Cream the butter, sugar, and lavender until light and fluffy.
Add the flour, cornstarch, and salt and mix well.
Divide the dough in half and form into squares.
Seal in plastic wrap and refrigerate until cool.
Roll the dough until it's about half an inch thick and cut into squares.
steps.description: You can use a pizza cutter for this.

steps.headline: Place squares on parchment paper or a Silpat and pierce each several times with a fork.

text: Cream the butter, sugar, and lavender until light and fluffy.  Add the flour, cornstarch, and salt and mix well.  Divide the dough in half and form into squares.  Seal in plastic wrap and refrigerate until cool.  Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C).  Roll the dough until it's about half an inch thick and cut into squares. You can use a pizza cutter for this. Place squares on parchment paper or a Silpat and pierce each several times with a fork.  Bake at 325ºF for 20 minutes.  Finished.
